page.title: 03HOMELIFE (a)
page.content: A day in the life of Mrs.Smith.Mrs. Smith says her life is most uninteresting. She is the Mother o two little girls Carriann, aged four and Haley aged six. Mrs. Smith usually gets up at 7.30 a.m.to make husband's breakfast of fresh orange juice, cereals, bacon or sausage with fried egg and cooked tin tomatoes. Then at 8.00 a.m. she gets her children up gives them their cereals for breakfast then dresses and prepares them for school,and play school. When she returns home after taking Haley to school she begins cleaning and tidying the house.Carriann is taken by a neighbour to Play School. Mrs. Smith prepares the dinner of minced meat,frozen peas,and mashed potatoes.Then she collects Carriann and her neighbours child.After Carrian has had her lunch she sleeps.
